commit message:
Tried to reduce coupling between Activity & Service to prevent crashing behaviour (See issue #22).
Updated TrackContentProvider to manage querying the current track directory.
Added Spanish translation thanks to benjavalero.
First effort to integrate viesturz patch for real time OpenStreetMap track display.
Added Swedish translation thanks to strickz.
Added preference to display or not OSM data in track display background

Use OpenStreetMap tiles as track display background
Small bugfixes
Added new translations
